text: Kusruthi is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. Anil and Babu Narayanan, starring Harisree Asokan and Kalabhavan Mani in the lead roles. ==Cast== *Kalabhavan Mani as Ezhumagalam Panan Gurukkal *Harisree Ashokan as Unni/Kumaran *Rajan P. Dev as Dathran *Baburaj as Ramabhadran *Mani C. Kappan *Narendra Prasad as Sreevallabhan *Vakkom Jayalal as Balabhadra *Tini Tom as Const. Pithambaran *Prem Prakash as CI Kaduva Narayanan *Kannur Sreelatha as Perly *Spadikam George *Sagar Shiyas as Vasu *Indrans as Campion Bhaskaran *Salim Kumar as Const.Chakko *Machan Varghese - Cameo Appearance *Kochu Preman - Cameo Appearance *Kollam Siraj - Cameo Appearance *Binda - Singer (Cameo) ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Babu Narayanan
title: Kusruthi
